title: Fovr nevv playes viz : The seege of Vrbin, Selindra, Love and frienship, Tragy-comedies, Pandora, a comedy / written by Sr. William Killigrew ...
author: Killigrew, William, Sir, 1606-1695.
publisher: Printed by Hen. Hall ..., for Ric. Davis,
notes: Contains the first edition of The seege of Urbin.
"Love and friendship" published, 1665, with title: Ormasdes.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
